meanings.definition: Having a large belly or protruding stomach.
meanings.sent1: The man with the paunched belly struggled to bend over.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the paunched appearance of the cat after it ate too much.
meanings.sent3: The paunched teddy bear looked like it had a big secret hidden inside.
meanings.sent4: The paunched clouds in the sky seemed ready to burst with rain.
meanings.sent5: The paunched balloon slowly deflated after the party.

meanings.sent1: He paunched out after eating a huge meal.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel paunched happily on the nuts it found.
meanings.sent3: The balloon paunched up as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent4: The river paunched over the rocks, creating a small waterfall.
meanings.sent5: She paunched with pride after finishing the race.

meanings.sent1: His paunched was noticeable under his tight shirt.
meanings.sent2: The bear's paunched shook as it danced on its hind legs.
meanings.sent3: The paunched of the pumpkin made it perfect for carving.
meanings.sent4: The paunched of the hill made it challenging to climb.
meanings.sent5: The paunched of the bag revealed it was full of treats.
